mapper.select: SELECT TOP 25 A.EMP_NO, ISNUlL(B.LEVEL2_NM,'-') AS JIKGUP_CD, ISNULL(C.KOR_NM,'-') AS KOR_NM, ISNULL(D.PJT_NM,'-') AS PJT_CD, A.D_01,D_02,D_03,D_04,D_05,D_06,D_07,D_08,D_09,D_10, D_11,D_12,D_13,D_14,D_15,D_16,D_17,D_18,D_19,D_20, D_21,D_22,D_23,D_24,D_25,D_26,D_27,D_28,D_29,D_30,D_31 FROM T_PM1070 A, T_SC9100 B, T_HM1000 C, T_SM3000_2016 D WHERE((A.JIKGUP_CD *= B.LEVEL2_CD) AND (B.LEVEL1_CD='110' AND B.BUSI_GB= 'H' )) AND(A.PJT_CD *= D.PJT_CD) AND((A.EMP_NO *= C.EMP_NO))
